scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.build:env: npm run lint:env && npm run test:env
scripts.build:env:browser: npm run lint:env:browser && npm run test:env:browser
scripts.build:env:node: npm run lint:env:node && npm run test:env:node
scripts.build:rules: npm run lint:rules && npm run test:rules
scripts.build:rules:all: npm run lint:rules:all && npm run test:rules:all
scripts.build:rules:rec: npm run lint:rules:rec && npm run test:rules:rec
scripts.build:rules:tsall: npm run lint:rules:tsall && npm run test:rules:tsall
scripts.build:rules:tsrec: npm run lint:rules:tsrec && npm run test:rules:tsrec
scripts.test:all: npm run test:env && npm run test:rules
scripts.test:env: npm run test:env:browser && npm run test:env:node
scripts.test:rules: npm run test:rules:all && npm run test:rules:rec && npm run test:rules:tsall && npm run test:rules:tsrec
scripts.prepub:all: npm run prepub:env && npm run prepub:rules
scripts.prepub:env: npm run prepub:env:browser && npm run prepub:env:node
scripts.prepub:rules: npm run prepub:rules:all && npm run prepub:rules:rec && npm run prepub:rules:tsall && npm run prepub:rules:tsrec
scripts.prepub:env:browser: npm run build:env:browser && npm run license:env:browser && npm run version:env:browser
scripts.prepub:env:node: npm run build:env:node && npm run license:env:node && npm run version:env:node
scripts.prepub:rules:all: npm run build:rules:all && npm run license:rules:all && npm run version:rules:all
scripts.prepub:rules:rec: npm run build:rules:rec && npm run license:rules:rec && npm run version:rules:rec
scripts.prepub:rules:tsall: npm run build:rules:tsall && npm run license:rules:tsall && npm run version:rules:tsall
scripts.prepub:rules:tsrec: npm run build:rules:tsrec && npm run license:rules:tsrec && npm run version:rules:tsrec
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:env && npm run publish:rules
scripts.publish:env: npm run publish:env:browser && npm run publish:env:node
scripts.publish:rules: npm run publish:rules:all && npm run publish:rules:rec && npm run publish:rules:tsall && npm run publish:rules:tsrec
scripts.publish:env:browser: npm run prepub:env:browser && cd env/browser && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:env:node: npm run prepub:env:node && cd env/node && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rules:all: npm run prepub:rules:all && cd rules/all && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rules:rec: npm run prepub:rules:rec && cd rules/recommended && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rules:tsall: npm run prepub:rules:tsall && cd rules/ts/all && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rules:tsrec: npm run prepub:rules:tsrec && cd rules/ts/recommended && npm publish --access public
